Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:34:51
Folder: C722L0G - vpn connectivity issue – temporary workaround instructions
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C722L0G_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-13 16:18
Subject: [Update] VPN Connectivity Issue – Temporary Workaround Instructions
--------------------------------------------------
 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague,

This is an update regarding the VPN connectivity issue impacting remote access to the D3 network, initially reported earlier today.

 

As a temporary workaround, please follow the steps below to reconfigure your VPN connection and restore access:

 

VPN Setup Instructions – HO1 Network

1.	Open your VPN client.
2.	Click the ‘+’ icon next to Connections to add a new network.
3.	Use the following link to configure the new connection: https://ho1ssl.e-mac.com/
4.	When prompted, enter your username (firstname.lastname) and your Chalhoub password.
5.	Connect to the VPN via the new HO1 network.

 

Our Tech teams are continuing to work on resolving the root issue and will share further updates as soon as possible.


For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
